body_html:
Unfortunately, operations compiled into their own shared library (which happens with operations in contrib) are not yet loadable in Java.

We will be making that possible, but no concrete timeline just yet.
I'm closing this as a duplicate of #10454 - the workaround there (which requires building from source) and will post updates there.

Thanks!

body:
Unfortunately, operations compiled into their own shared library (which happens with operations in contrib) are not yet loadable in Java.

We will be making that possible, but no concrete timeline just yet.
I'm closing this as a duplicate of #10454 - the workaround there (which requires building from source) and will post updates there.

Thanks!
